attributes.action: Remove the unelected House of Lords.
attributes.additional_details:
On the 23rd of June 2016 the country voted on a mandate from the incumbent prime minister. David Cameron. The Vote was to decide democratecly through the wishes of the majority , to stay in the EU or Leave.
The vote went 51.9% to leave. 48.1% remain. Turnout 72.2% turnout. Based on the government leaflet and official information, I believed the vote from the Referendum would be the decider .
attributes.background: It is my personal opinion that the House of Lords does not have a mandate to block the majority wishes of both the democratic people of the UK & The House of Commons to serve Article 50 NOW.
